name: Demon Conquest- pixel RPG
description:
Demon Conquest is a pixel RPG game following story of a Demon king and his Conquest in achieving Godhood but eventually failing and getting sealed for 400 years by Gods.

And now he is back along with his 5 demon lords.

Become a hero and save the world by defeating his subordinates.

Characters available -

 • Monk - remain calm and kill demons using your golden fist.

• Shooter - use gun, destroy your enemies from distance without getting hurt.

• Hero - achieve victory by relying on speed and sword
